site.name: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o — EU Fertilizer Sourcing Agency
hero.title: EU-Based Phosphate & Specialty Fertilizer Sourcing
hero.subtitle: Structured execution. Shipment-verified compliance. Multi-origin supply.
hero.desc: We connect producers with serious buyers through transparent sourcing, shipment-specific third-party COA, and EU-focused trade execution.
hero.specsNote: Multi-origin supply. COA available upon request.
hero.productsLine: Rock Phosphate • Water-Soluble Fertilizers (WSF) • Calcium Nitrate • Micronutrients
hero.productsOnRequest: • On request: NPK Granular • Water-Retention Polymer (Hydrogel)
hero.tradeNote: Execution: LC at sight • SGS/Intertek/BV inspection • shipment-specific documentation
products.title: Flagship Product
products.lead: Rock Phosphate — Grades 18–32% P₂O₅ (subject to availability & shipment-specific COA) (reference sample: 26%)
products.spec1: Screened granulometry — ready for milling or direct application
products.spec2: Specification sheet included; buyer-specific analyses available
products.note: Also available on request: NPK Granular • Water-Retention Polymer (Hydrogel).
cat.rp.title: Rock Phosphate
cat.rp.text: Multi-origin supply with grade and heavy-metals verified by shipment-specific COA (SGS/Intertek/BV upon request). Low-cadmium options are available subject to shipment COA confirmation.
cat.rp.s3: COA: P₂O₅, CaO, SiO₂, Al₂O₃, Fe₂O₃, MgO, SO₃, Cl, LOI
cat.rp.s4: Low-Cd: available upon request (shipment COA required)
cat.wsf.title: Water-Soluble Fertilizers (WSF)
cat.wsf.text: NPK water-soluble grades tailored to crop programs and regional demand. COA provided per shipment.
cat.cn.title: Calcium Nitrate
cat.cn.text: CN options for fertigation and open-field use. Specification and COA provided per shipment.
cat.micro.title: Micronutrients
cat.micro.text: Micronutrient portfolio for blending or direct application. COA and specification are provided by product.
cat.micro.s1: Types: Zn / Fe / Mn / B / Cu / Mo
services.title: Structured Trade & Execution Services
services.agro.text: EU-aligned sourcing support for importers and distributors. We coordinate verified supply channels, align documentation requirements, and structure transactions to reduce procurement risk.
services.quality.text: Independent third-party inspection (SGS / Intertek / BV) can be coordinated at loading to validate shipment-grade specifications and ensure contractual alignment.
services.analysis.text: Review and alignment of shipment documentation including COA, heavy metals analysis, Certificate of Origin, and commercial documents to support EU import and regulatory compliance.
card.rock.title: Rock Phosphate — Grades 18–32% P₂O₅
card.rock.text: Structured sourcing with consolidated shipments to EU ports. Final chemical and physical parameters are confirmed by shipment-specific COA and applicable inspection reports.
card.rock.forms: Available forms: Powder / Granular / Fine Powder (subject to origin)
card.rock.moisture: Moisture levels: typically 3–5% (grade and seasonal variation applicable)
card.rock.hm: Heavy metals analysis (including Cd) provided within official shipment documentation upon request
card.lowcd.title: Low-Cadmium Rock Phosphate — 31–32% P₂O₅
card.lowcd.text: Available upon request. Marketed only after receiving a shipment-specific COA confirming Cd and heavy metals for the shipment lot.
card.urea.title: Urea / NPK (on request)
card.urea.text: Additional product lines (Urea, MAP/DAP, NPK) can be added based on demand, with flexible supply options.
card.custom.title: Custom specs
card.custom.text: Tailored supply, packing, and analyses per buyer requirements, supported by official documentation.
coa.title: Sample Specification Sheet — Rock Phosphate (Reference: 26% P₂O₅)
coa.sub: Marketing sample for presentation only. Final values are confirmed per shipment via COA/SGS. Other grades (18–32% P₂O₅) are subject to availability & shipment-specific COA.
sieve.title: Sieving Analysis — Rock Phosphate (Sample)
sieve.sub: Granulometry and particle size distribution — suitable for milling or direct application.
log.title: Logistics & Compliance
log.incoterms: Transactions structured under standard Incoterms including EXW, FOB, CFR, CIF, and DDP (subject to contractual agreement). Shipment milestones and documentation updates are communicated after formal booking confirmation.
log.ports: Ports vary by origin and product availability.
log.ports.tag: Loading ports confirmed per shipment (subject to schedule & allocation)
log.ports.p: Shipping options include bulk vessels and containerized cargo (20’). Packing formats: bulk with liner or jumbo bags, depending on contract specifications.
log.compliance.p: Standard export documentation includes Certificate of Origin, Commercial Invoice, Packing List, and analytical reports. Documentation review and alignment are conducted prior to issuance where applicable. Transactions are structured in alignment with EU import and regulatory requirements.
how.title: How We Work (EU Sourcing & Risk-Control)
how.lead: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. operates as an independent EU-based sourcing and transaction coordination company. We connect verified suppliers with qualified buyers and support the process in a structured and compliant manner.
how.policyLead: To protect all parties and ensure professional execution, we follow standard international trade practices:
how.p1: Preferred payment: LC at sight (100%) — subject to buyer/seller agreement
how.p3: Independent inspection at loading: SGS / Intertek / BV (as agreed)
how.p4: Shipment-specific documentation: COA/SGS per shipment; heavy metals (e.g., Cd) provided upon request or market requirement
how.p5: Full shipment documentation is shared exclusively with verified buyers upon formal request
how.conf.title: Confidentiality & Engagement Framework
how.conf.text: We apply professional confidentiality when introducing parties. Counterparty details are shared only after receiving a serious request (RFQ/LOI), and the engagement framework is confirmed in writing to ensure clarity, transparency, and protection for all parties. Repeat orders or transactions with introduced parties remain covered within the agreed protection term.
how.noteText: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is not a contracting party to the sales contract between seller and buyer. The sales contract, delivery terms, and performance obligations are agreed directly between the seller and buyer, supported by LC conditions and independent third-party inspection where applicable.
compliance.title: Compliance & Verification
compliance.lead: Specifications shown are indicative and provided for commercial guidance only. Final product parameters are confirmed exclusively by shipment-specific COA and independent inspection reports where applicable.
compliance.p1: Shipment-specific COA and/or independent inspection report (SGS or equivalent) issued per lot
compliance.p2: Heavy metals analysis (including Cd and other relevant elements) provided within official shipment documentation upon request
compliance.p3: Original export documentation is shared exclusively with verified buyers following contractual alignment
compliance.p4: Low-cadmium grades (e.g., 31–32% P₂O₅) are marketed only upon receipt of shipment-specific COA confirming heavy metal levels
cert.title: Product Specifications & Compliance Documents
cert.note: Note: The documents displayed below are public marketing samples. Shipment-specific originals (COA / SGS / MSDS / COO) are shared exclusively with verified buyers upon RFQ confirmation.

sgs.sub: Independent third-party inspection can be arranged per shipment (as agreed). Official, shipment-specific reports are shared with verified buyers upon request.
eu.title: EU Compliance Documents
eu.sub: Documentation supports compliance with applicable EU requirements and product safety regulations. Full originals are shared with verified buyers upon request.

msds.sub: Material Safety Data Sheet (summary) for compliance and safe handling guidance.
msds.note: Public sample only — shipment MSDS on request.
lowcad.title: Low-Cadmium Rock Phosphate (31–32% P₂O₅)
lowcad.sub: Available on request. Marketed only with shipment-specific third-party COA/inspection confirming Cd & heavy metals.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is an EU-based sourcing and coordination company connecting qualified buyers with verified suppliers across multiple origins.
about.pricing: We support structured transaction execution with transparent coordination and competitive terms based on verified sourcing and shipment-specific documentation.
about.p2: Independent third-party inspection (SGS / Intertek / BV) and shipment-specific COA documentation can be arranged upon request (as agreed).
about.p3: The company is registered in the Czech Republic and operates in alignment with applicable EU trade, customs, and regulatory frameworks.
about.note: Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. is not a contracting party to the sales contract. Contract terms and performance obligations are agreed directly between the seller and the buyer.
payment.title: Payment & Settlement Framework
payment.opt.lcSight: Irrevocable LC at sight (100%) — Primary structure
payment.opt.lcUsance: Usance / Deferred LC — subject to compliance review and approval
payment.opt.collection: Documentary Collection (D/P only) — for qualified repeat buyers
payment.opt.sblc: SBLC / Bank Guarantee — as contractually agreed (if required)
payment.disclaimer: Final payment terms are agreed case-by-case based on compliance, counterparty verification, and transaction structure.
payment.lead: Payments and trade settlements are handled directly between the buyer and the seller. Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. operates as an independent EU-based sourcing and coordination partner supporting structured transaction execution.
payment.note: Supplier bank details are provided in the Proforma Invoice (PI) after RFQ confirmation and buyer verification.
contact.title: Get in touch
form.name: Name
contact.note: We do not use analytics cookies. This form opens your mail application to send the message directly.
contact.docs: Official documents (contracts, invoices, shipment-specific COA/SGS, and product specifications) are shared after request qualification and buyer verification.
footer.payment: All payments and trade settlements are conducted directly between the buyer and the seller. Euro Agri Trading s.r.o. operates as an independent EU-based sourcing and coordination partner.
